name: Hunk Companion
author: ThemeHunk

sections.description:
Hunk Companion contain all features which are required to create a complete website. Main motive behind this plugin is to boost up functionality of ThemeHunk themes. This plugin will work for Gogo, Almaira and upcoming ThemeHunk themes.

Key Features:-

Features:
– Add service section
– Add Team Section
– Add clients-and-testimonials section
– Add about-us section
– Add slider-typewriter section
– Add call-to section
– Add woocommerce section
– Add portfolio section
– Add pricing section
– Add Ribbon section
– Add blog section
– Add contact-us section
– Add social section
– Add Homepage Layout section
– Add Product Filter
– Add Categories Section
– Add Instagram Section
– Add Hero Slider

Not all but required features will be added to particular theme.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the hunk-companion.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to Install Plugin

Just upload the hunk-companion.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, and then activate it from ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  1. Docs
  2. Support Forum

This plugin only work for ThemeHunk themes

Yes this plugin is specially make for ThemeHunk themes like Gogo. You can install theme for better compatibility.

short_description: Adds customizer settings and controls to the Gogo Theme.
